title: Understanding Quadratic Functions Using Dynamic Geometry Software

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Quadratic function inquiry linked to real-life problems through social science methodologies

learning_goals: Students can visualize and explain transformations between standard and general forms of quadratic functions using dynamic software.
Learners interpret quadratic function graphs based on real-world cases and build predictive models.
Learners develop algorithms to solve maximum/minimum value problems of quadratic functions through cooperative learning.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
